Title: Increases the state subsidy for school lunch meals
Summary: Increases the state subsidy for school lunch meals based on the percentage of breakfast service, lunch service and reimbursable snack program food purchased from New York state farmers, growers, producers or processors.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 537 of the laws of 1976 relating to paid, free and reduced price breakfast for eligible pupils in certain school districts, in relation to increasing the state subsidy for school lunch meals
